languages.text: {n}Чистоголосый пророк собрал свою паству и, погрузив Горнило на предоставленный ему пустотный корабль, отправился проповедовать на далекие миры. Духовная власть Ордена Молота, потерпела ущерб, а потеря Горнила вызвала немалые народные волнения. Перед отбытием в знак признательности проповедник направил Лорд-капитану дар — реликвию, которая по его словам, некогда принадлежала его прошлому воплощению.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Чистоголосый пророк собрал свою паству и, погрузив Горнило на предоставленный ему пустотный корабль, отправился проповедовать на далекие миры. Духовная власть Ордена Молота, потерпела ущерб, а потеря Горнила вызвала немалые народные волнения. Перед отбытием в знак признательности проповедник направил Лорд-капитану дар — реликвию, которая по его словам, некогда принадлежала его прошлому воплощению.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Having loaded the Crucible onto the requisitioned voidship, the Pure-Voiced Prophet gathered up his flock and set out for distant worlds to spread His word. The spiritual authority of the Order of the Hammer suffered as a result, and the loss of the Crucible sowed substantial unrest among the populace. Before departing, the preacher expressed his appreciation by sending the Lord Captain a gift — a relic that, according to his own claims, once belonged to his previous incarnation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Чистоголосый пророк собрал свою паству и, погрузив Горнило на предоставленный ему пустотный корабль, отправился проповедовать на далекие миры. Духовная власть Ордена Молота, потерпела ущерб, а потеря Горнила вызвала немалые народные волнения. Перед отбытием в знак признательности проповедник направил Лорд-капитану дар — реликвию, которая по его словам, некогда принадлежала его прошлому воплощению.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet gathered his flock, brought the Crucible on board the voidship he was provided with, and set out for distant worlds to spread His word. The spiritual authority of the Order of the Hammer suffered as a result, and the loss of the Crucible sowed substantial unrest among the populace. Before departing, the preacher expressed his appreciation by sending the Lord Captain a gift — a relic that, according to his own claims, once belonged to his previous incarnation.{/n}

Before departing, the preacher expressed his appreciation by sending the Lord Captain a gift — a relic that, according to his own claims, once belonged to his previous incarnation.{/n}

languages.text: {n}纯洁之声先知将熔炉装上了被征用的虚空舰，召集了他的牧群，向遥远世界出发，传播他的话语。重锤修会的精神权威因此受到影响，而行星失去了熔炉，也在民众中播下了大量的动荡之种。在离开之前，这位布道士送给了领主舰长一件礼物，以表达他的感激之情。据他自己说，这件遗物曾属于他的前世。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having loaded the Crucible onto the requisitioned voidship, the Pure-Voiced Prophet gathered up his flock and set out for distant worlds to spread His word. The spiritual authority of the Order of the Hammer suffered as a result, and the loss of the Crucible sowed substantial unrest among the populace. Before departing, the preacher expressed his appreciation by sending the Lord Captain a gift — a relic that, according to his own claims, once belonged to his previous incarnation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}纯洁之声先知将熔炉装上了被征用的虚空舰，召集了他的牧群，向遥远世界出发，传播他的话语。重锤修会的精神权威因此受到影响，而行星失去了熔炉，也在民众中播下了大量的动荡之种。在离开之前，这位布道士送给了领主舰长一件礼物，以表达他的感激之情。据他自己说，这件遗物曾属于他的前世。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El Profeta de Voz Pura, tras cargar el Crisol en la nave del vacío requisada, reunió a su rebaño y partió hacia mundos lejanos para difundir Su palabra. La autoridad espiritual de la Orden del Martillo sufrió las consecuencias, y la pérdida del Crisol sembró un gran malestar entre la población. Antes de partir, el predicador expresó su agradecimiento enviando {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán un regalo: una reliquia que, según sus propias afirmaciones, perteneció a su anterior encarnación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having loaded the Crucible onto the requisitioned voidship, the Pure-Voiced Prophet gathered up his flock and set out for distant worlds to spread His word. The spiritual authority of the Order of the Hammer suffered as a result, and the loss of the Crucible sowed substantial unrest among the populace. Before departing, the preacher expressed his appreciation by sending the Lord Captain a gift — a relic that, according to his own claims, once belonged to his previous incarnation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El Profeta de Voz Pura, tras cargar el Crisol en la nave del vacío requisada, reunió a su rebaño y partió hacia mundos lejanos para difundir Su palabra. La autoridad espiritual de la Orden del Martillo sufrió las consecuencias, y la pérdida del Crisol sembró un gran malestar entre la población. Antes de partir, el predicador expresó su agradecimiento enviando {mf|al|a la} Lord Capitán un regalo: una reliquia que, según sus propias afirmaciones, perteneció a su anterior encarnación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}要請されたヴォイドシップに坩堝を積み込むと、純声の預言者は群れを集め、皇帝の御言葉を広めるために遠い惑星へと旅立った。その結果、鉄槌の修道会の精神的権威は失墜し、坩堝を失ったことで、民の間に動揺が広がった。出発前、プリーチャーは感謝の気持ちを込めて、ロード・キャプテンに遺物を贈った...彼自身の言葉によれば、その遺物はかつて前世の彼が所有していたものだという。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having loaded the Crucible onto the requisitioned voidship, the Pure-Voiced Prophet gathered up his flock and set out for distant worlds to spread His word. The spiritual authority of the Order of the Hammer suffered as a result, and the loss of the Crucible sowed substantial unrest among the populace. Before departing, the preacher expressed his appreciation by sending the Lord Captain a gift — a relic that, according to his own claims, once belonged to his previous incarnation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}要請されたヴォイドシップに坩堝を積み込むと、純声の預言者は群れを集め、皇帝の御言葉を広めるために遠い惑星へと旅立った。その結果、鉄槌の修道会の精神的権威は失墜し、坩堝を失ったことで、民の間に動揺が広がった。出発前、プリーチャーは感謝の気持ちを込めて、ロード・キャプテンに遺物を贈った...彼自身の言葉によれば、その遺物はかつて前世の彼が所有していたものだという。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Après avoir chargé le Creuset à bord du vaisseau réquisitionné, le prophète Pure-Voix rassemble ses ouailles et fait route vers des mondes lointains afin d'y prêcher la bonne parole. L'autorité spirituelle de l'Ordre du Marteau en souffre grandement, et la perte du Creuset déclenche un profond émoi au sein de la population. Avant d'appareiller, le prêcheur exprime sa gratitude {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} sous la forme d'un présent, une relique qui, selon ses propres dires, aurait appartenu à sa précédente incarnation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having loaded the Crucible onto the requisitioned voidship, the Pure-Voiced Prophet gathered up his flock and set out for distant worlds to spread His word. The spiritual authority of the Order of the Hammer suffered as a result, and the loss of the Crucible sowed substantial unrest among the populace. Before departing, the preacher expressed his appreciation by sending the Lord Captain a gift — a relic that, according to his own claims, once belonged to his previous incarnation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir chargé le Creuset à bord du vaisseau réquisitionné, le prophète Pure-Voix rassemble ses ouailles et fait route vers des mondes lointains afin d'y prêcher la bonne parole. L'autorité spirituelle de l'Ordre du Marteau en souffre grandement, et la perte du Creuset déclenche un profond émoi au sein de la population. Avant d'appareiller, le prêcheur exprime sa gratitude {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} sous la forme d'un présent, une relique qui, selon ses propres dires, aurait appartenu à sa précédente incarnation.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nachdem der Prophet mit der Reinen Stimme den Tiegel auf das bereitgestellte Raumschiff geladen hatte, versammelte er seine Gemeinde und brach zu fernen Welten auf, um seine Kunde zu verbreiten. Die spirituelle Autorität des Ordens des Hammers litt darunter, und der Verlust des Tiegels sorgte für beträchtliche Unruhe in der Bevölkerung. Vor seiner Abreise verlieh der Prediger seinem Dank Ausdruck, in dem er dem Lord Captain ein Geschenk sandte — eine Reliquie, die angeblich einmal seiner früheren Inkarnation gehört habe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having loaded the Crucible onto the requisitioned voidship, the Pure-Voiced Prophet gathered up his flock and set out for distant worlds to spread His word. The spiritual authority of the Order of the Hammer suffered as a result, and the loss of the Crucible sowed substantial unrest among the populace. Before departing, the preacher expressed his appreciation by sending the Lord Captain a gift — a relic that, according to his own claims, once belonged to his previous incarnation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nachdem der Prophet mit der Reinen Stimme den Tiegel auf das bereitgestellte Raumschiff geladen hatte, versammelte er seine Gemeinde und brach zu fernen Welten auf, um seine Kunde zu verbreiten. Vor seiner Abreise verlieh der Prediger seinem Dank Ausdruck, in dem er dem Lord Captain ein Geschenk sandte — eine Reliquie, die angeblich einmal seiner früheren Inkarnation gehört habe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Peygamber Durusöz, Pota'yı talep edilen uçsuz gemisine yüklemesinin ardından cemaatini topladı ve İmparator'un sözünü yaymak için uzaklardaki dünyalara doğru yola çıktı. Bunun sonucunda Çekiç Tarikatı'nın ruhani otoritesi zarar gördü ve Pota'nın kaybedilmesi, ayaktakımının yüreğine huzursuzluğun tohumlarını ekti. Vaiz, ayrılmadan önce Lord Kaptan'a bir hediye göndererek minnettarlığını ifade etti. Hediye, iddiasına göre bir vakitler önceki vücut buluşuna ait olan bir yadigârdı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Having loaded the Crucible onto the requisitioned voidship, the Pure-Voiced Prophet gathered up his flock and set out for distant worlds to spread His word. The spiritual authority of the Order of the Hammer suffered as a result, and the loss of the Crucible sowed substantial unrest among the populace. Before departing, the preacher expressed his appreciation by sending the Lord Captain a gift — a relic that, according to his own claims, once belonged to his previous incarnation.{/n}
